channel.title: XAMPP Security
channel.description: Hey, so XAMPP is only really useful if you are using MySQL at home to test your server because of security problems. So, what would I use to actually run my server on a VPS/dedi if I was hosting (saving and loading done via SQL)?

item.title: XAMPP Security
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Why would it be a troll thread? That’s so cliche it’s kind of annoying, just asking a simple question. I’ve only used cPanel through a webserver, so does that mean I can use phpMyAdmin to save my game database too, the same as my forum database?

Read full topic

item.title: XAMPP Security
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

is this a troll thread?

those that are handicapped can rejoice phpMyAdmin comes standard with Cpanel/WHM and can be installed seperately.

Read full topic
